00012 typedef char *address;
00013 typedef short int shortint;

00019 typedef short int shortlogical;

00034 /* for -i2 */

00037 typedef short ftnint;

00041 typedef int ftnint;

00044 /*external read, write*/
00045 typedef struct
00046 {       flag cierr;
00047         ftnint ciunit;
00048         flag ciend;
00049         char *cifmt;
00050         ftnint cirec;
00051 } cilist;
00052

00055 {       flag icierr;
00056         char *iciunit;
00057         flag iciend;
00058         char *icifmt;

00060         ftnint icirnum;
00061 } icilist;

00119 #define VOID void

00121 union Multitype {       /* for multiple entry points */
00122         shortint h;
00123         integer i;
00124         real r;
00125         doublereal d;
00126         complex c;
00127         doublecomplex z;
00128         };
00129 
00130 typedef union Multitype Multitype;

00132 typedef long Long;      /* No longer used; formerly in Namelist */

00134 struct Vardesc {        /* for Namelist */
00135         char *name;
00136         char *addr;
00137         ftnlen *dims;
00138         int  type;
00139         };
00140 typedef struct Vardesc Vardesc;

00142 struct Namelist {
00143         char *name;
00144         Vardesc **vars;
00145         int nvars;
00146         };
00147 typedef struct Namelist Namelist;
00148 
00149 #ifndef abs
00150 #define abs(x) ((x) >= 0 ? (x) : -(x))
00151 #endif
00152 #define dabs(x) (doublereal)abs(x)
00153 #ifndef min
00154 #define min(a,b) ((a) <= (b) ? (a) : (b))
00155 #endif
00156 #ifndef max
00157 #define max(a,b) ((a) >= (b) ? (a) : (b))
00158 #endif
00159 #define dmin(a,b) (doublereal)min(a,b)
00160 #define dmax(a,b) (doublereal)max(a,b)
00161 
00162 /* procedure parameter types for -A and -C++ */
00163 
00164 #define F2C_proc_par_types 1
00165 #ifdef __cplusplus
00166 typedef int /* Unknown procedure type */ (*U_fp)(...);
00167 typedef shortint (*J_fp)(...);
00168 typedef integer (*I_fp)(...);
00169 typedef real (*R_fp)(...);
00170 typedef doublereal (*D_fp)(...), (*E_fp)(...);
00171 typedef /* Complex */ VOID (*C_fp)(...);
00172 typedef /* Double Complex */ VOID (*Z_fp)(...);
00173 typedef logical (*L_fp)(...);
00174 typedef shortlogical (*K_fp)(...);
00175 typedef /* Character */ VOID (*H_fp)(...);
00176 typedef /* Subroutine */ int (*S_fp)(...);
00177 #else
00178 typedef int /* Unknown procedure type */ (*U_fp)(void);
00179 typedef shortint (*J_fp)(void);
00180 typedef integer (*I_fp)(void);
00181 typedef real (*R_fp)(void);
00182 typedef doublereal (*D_fp)(void), (*E_fp)(void);
00183 typedef /* Complex */ VOID (*C_fp)(void);
00184 typedef /* Double Complex */ VOID (*Z_fp)(void);
00185 typedef logical (*L_fp)(void);
00186 typedef shortlogical (*K_fp)(void);
00187 typedef /* Character */ VOID (*H_fp)(void);
00188 typedef /* Subroutine */ int (*S_fp)(void);
00189 #endif
00190 /* E_fp is for real functions when -R is not specified */
00191 typedef VOID C_f;       /* complex function */
00192 typedef VOID H_f;       /* character function */
00193 typedef VOID Z_f;       /* double complex function */
00194 typedef doublereal E_f; /* real function with -R not specified */
